title: BRIEF-SilverBridge Holdings Posts FY HEPS Of 25.81 Cents Per Share
text:
BRIEF-SilverBridge Holdings Posts FY HEPS Of 25.81 Cents Per Share

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 12, 2019 13:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-SilverBridge Holdings Posts FY HEPS Of 25.81 Cents Per Share Sept 12 (Reuters) - SilverBridge Holdings Ltd : * PRELIMINARY AUDITED CONSOLIDATED RESULTS FOR THE YEAR ENDED 30 JUNE 2019 * FY HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE ("HEPS") DECREASED BY 228% TO A LOSS OF 25.81 CENTS PER SHARE * FY DIVIDENDS PER SHARE DECREASED BY 100% TO 0 CENTS PER SHARE, FROM 4.5 CENTS PER SHARE * FY REVENUE DECREASED BY 8% TO R87.7 MILLION

BRIEF-SilverBridge Holdings Posts FY HEPS Of 25.81 Cents Per Share
